oracle.notes: Oracle for gaps only; do not copy full contents into spec.

selected_reference.label: ccw-plan
selected_reference.why: Has CCW-aligned YAML frontmatter + coordinator-style structure useful as a formatting and tool-permission reference.

evidence_sources.heading: Flow Template Generator
evidence_sources.why: Source-of-truth for flow-create intent and phase headings (non-leaky: headings only).

evidence_sources.heading: /flow-create
evidence_sources.why: Public docs confirm invocation is /flow-create and provide concise user-facing feature framing.
Shows how CCW reads YAML frontmatter from .claude/commands/*.md and why flow-create needs frontmatter to render correctly in UI/API.
UI uses /api/commands and groups; highlights where command metadata surfaces to users.

similar_commands.why: Another command doc with complete frontmatter + core sections; useful for consistent heading/section formatting.
Shows allowed-tools conventions (tool names + (*) suffix) and concise error-handling section patterns.
